Enable Pressure Transducer:
Use ADS1115
ADS1115 Gain/Max input voltage
Control Pressure:
Pressure Conversion parameters:
Pressure in PSI= (A0_reading - b) * a
b: a:

Step1: under no pressure, 0 psi, press

Step2: under pressure psi, press
